name: mp3-auto-cover
description: Tool that scans MP3 files, reads ID3 tags, fetches missing covers using MusicBrainz/CoverArtArchive/DuckDuckGo, and embeds them.

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --watch index.ts --exec node --loader ts-node/esm index.ts
scripts.recognize: nodemon --watch src --watch index.ts --exec node --loader ts-node/esm index.ts -- --recognize
